CmdLine: apt-get update     && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends         less     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

CmdLine: git clone --depth=1 --branch=0.3.1 https://github.com/ingydotnet/git-subrepo.git /tmp/git-subrepo         && cd /tmp/git-subrepo         && make install         && cd -         && rm -rf /tmp/git-subrepo
